channel.title: Help with my script =_=

item.title: Help with my script =_=
item.dc:creator: @blehhh blehhh
item.description:
@blehhh wrote:

Ok I’m don’t know alot about scripting so I am posting this obviously, I made an auto-skeleton clicker and I just want it to click on the skeleton until it dies from me shooting it and it finds another skeleton, but the rs client just freezes up until I press stop and then it goes back to normal, what is the problem? For all your people that like to steal scripts, this one doesn’t work and if you do copy and paste this it will just freeze up Rs.

Here’s the script … fix and repost, or just tell me if this idea will never work…

program autoskele;
var
x, y, z, monster1: Integer;
begin
monster1:= 13027237;
z:=0;
findwindowtitlepart('RuneScape',false);
activateclient;
wait(500);
repeat
if(FindColorSpiral(x, y, monster1, 135, 153, 901, 651))then
begin
clickmouse(x, y, true)
wait(1775)
END
until(x = 5000000)
end.

Read full topic
